name: Whale Eater
description:
SOLUTIONS:

Made in two days for GMTK Jam 2021, with the theme Joined Together

It is only natural that a Whale Eater would be eaten in turn

HOW TO PLAY:

Move - A and D

Fire Grapple/Harpoon - Arrow Keys

Switch Equipment - Space Bar

Reset - R

Menu - Esc

CREDITS:

Programming and Game Design -  @moraguma

Art and Game Design - @AmoraHere

"Cyberspace Lurkers" by Carlos Hernandez
